quote_first: Scarcely had we left the golf links behind than he remarked - until that moment he had not uttered a single word, nor had I - "If you're going by the
quote_raw: Scarcely had we left the golf links behind than he remarked - until that moment he had not uttered a single word, nor had I - "If you're going by the 12.48 I'll see you off."
title: Under One Flag
author: Richard Marsh
